Text: John Aloysius Green:  His parents were John Green and Bridget (Kenny) Green.

Text: John Aloysius Green:  John A. Green came to Boston, Massachusetts, September 2, 1852, and attended the common schools.

<Text: John Aloysius Green:  In 1860 he learned the monumental trade and worked at it for ten years.>
